eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ingested

Class NumericalSimSearch<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ingested.NumericalSimSearch<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type variable representing the keys of the indexed objects.
    V - Type variable representing the values of the indexed objects.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimSearch<K,V>

    public class NumericalSimSearch<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
extends Object
implements ISimSearch<K,V>
    Implements similarity search against numerical values indexed in a B+-tree.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumericalSimSearch

        public NumericalSimSearch(BPlusTree<K,V> index,
                          K key,
                          ISimilarity<K> simMeasure,
                          RankedList partialResults,
                          Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        index - The underlying B+-tree index to be used in the search.
        key - The search key.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used.
        partialResults - Queue that collects the results of this search.
        log - Handle to the log file for notifications and execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Provides the ranking of the most recently issued result.
        Returns:
        The ranking order.

      • getScore

        public Double getScore()
        Provides the similarity score of the most recently issued result.
        Returns:
        The computed similarity score.

      • getNextResult

        public List<V> getNextResult()
        Progressively provides the next query result either leftwards or rightwards in the key range depending on similarity scores.
        Specified by:
        getNextResult in interface ISimSearch<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
        Returns:
        The next available result.

      • fetchNextBatch

        public int fetchNextBatch()
        Inserts to the result queue a batch of qualifying results corresponding to a single key.
        Returns:
        The number of qualifying results in the next batch.

      • fetchFirstBatch

        public int fetchFirstBatch(int topk)
        Provides the first batch of (at least topk) results and also specifies the scaling factor for scoring. CAUTION! Results are obtained with increasing distance; scores will be assigned once the scale factor is fixed.
        Parameters:
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        Returns:
        The number of items added in the first batch.

        Parameters:
        key - The search key.
        Returns:
        Similarity score of the found key with the search key.

      • compute

        public long compute(int topk,
                    int M)
        Collects the specified number of results of a similarity search query.
        Parameters:
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        M - The number of top-scoring results to fetch and populate the ranked list.
        Returns:
        The number of collected results.
